name: QLINDO
description: The future of investing. Qlindo bridges the gap between blockchain and green real estate investment opportunities, paving the way to a sustainable future. Qlindo believes that a forward-thinking real estate investment requires innovative technologies and commitment to the environment, people, and planet. This is the reason why Qlindo is set to become a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO), enabling community participation in decisions that make a difference.
